enhanced_classification.summary: Grab, Southeast Asia's leading super-app, implemented Claude to power their Merchant AI Assistant providing personalized business consulting and support to millions of merchant partners. The AI solution helps merchants across 8 regional markets with business analysis, strategic recommendations, and operational support.
enhanced_classification.problem_statement: Needed to provide consistent, high-quality personalized support at scale to a diverse merchant network ranging from small businesses to large retail chains across multiple countries and languages.
enhanced_classification.solution_description: Implemented Claude-powered Merchant AI Assistant that functions as a 24/7 business consultant, providing personalized recommendations, strategic guidance, and operational support in multiple regional languages.
enhanced_classification.key_quote: Anthropic works alongside our teams to solve business challenges, making them a true strategic collaborator in our AI journey.
enhanced_classification.date_reasoning: Article appears on Anthropic website with clear publish date of July 23, 2025
